launch_screen1_header: The way back to normal starts here.
launch_screen2_header: We save your location data every 5 minutes.
launch_screen2_subheader: Your data is only saved on your phone - we don't share it.
launch_screen3_header: If you cross paths with someone who tests positive for COVID-19, we will notify you.
launch_screen3_subheader: And tell you what to do next.
launch_screen4_header: If you test positive, share your anonymized data to alert those you crossed paths with.
launch_screen5_subheader: For this to work, we need to enable a few settings.
